## Description {#details}

Representative of a block.

This is a simple wrapper around an index into the reverse-post-order traversal of the blocks.

Unlike a block pointer, its order has meaning (location in the topological sort) and it&#39;s class is the same regardless of block type.

Definition at line 192 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-h">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl.h</a>.
